name: Elemental Wave
description:
Play with the elements in this simple card game.

 If you encounter unexpected card moves on the web version, please download the Windows build

HOW TO PLAY

- Drag and drop a card from your hand to the first row :

All cards of the same type will follow.

- Click "Next Turn" to continue.

Your cards and enemy cards will move forward until they meet each other.

In this case, a conflict will be resolved, where each card basically destroys one enemy card

ELEMENTS

Cards are basically elements (Fire, Earth, Air, Water and Void). Each element has a weakness and a strength. These are represented on top and bottom of the cards.

In the following conflict, only the Fire card will be destroyed:
Fire card only deals half damages to Water, not enough to destroy the card.

Here, things are balanced and all three cards will be destroyed:
Earth cards deal each half damage to the Void card, and Void card deals double damage.


Use this to chose the right cards and build your strategy to beat the Hard mode.

This game was made by Knight2fox and Draelent for the Weekly Game Jam 154with the theme "Rock Paper Scissors".
